name: Strangers (Rixium)
description:
People were told to go underground, and to hide away until further notice, after a virus sends the population into a frenzy.

You have limited supplies, and your sanity is slowly degrading, due to lack of human contact. Survive with the limited supplies that you have, and keep track of your needs, until you're contacted to leave. 

Keep track of the radio transmissions, so you can leave as soon as possible.

Use the radio as much as possible, or try to play it safe, and listen through slowly, but your food is limited, so be careful.

The story will only progress as you use the radio. It won't progress by sleeping.

Credits:

Royalty-Free music
Hinterheim - A long way into the clouds
